profile.title: Profili ya Mosebedisi
profile.mustLogin: Osengeli kokɔta liboso mpo na komona ba paramètres.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Lakisa ya liboso elongo na oyo ebongolami
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Lakisa ya liboso elongo na libongoli
profile.noPrivateKey: Clé ya ndingisa ezangi na appareil oyo mpo na kozwa.
profile.setBackupPassword: Talá mot de passe mpo na kobatela backup:
profile.enterBackupPassword: Kotisa mot de passe ya backup oyo:
profile.importSuccess: Clé privé ekotisamí na appareil oyo.
profile.importFailed: Ekotisami te (mot de passe ekɔngi te to fichier ebebá).
profile.keysRotated: Clé oyo ya sika esalemi, publique étindamí.
profile.importKey: Kokɔtisa backup ya clé ya kobatelami
profile.keyDisclaimer: Clé privé na yo ebima te na appareil. Bimisa kopi oyo ebatelami na mot de passe mpo na kozongisa na appareil mosusu.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Ozali na Free — salá Sun/Moon nse. Boya na mosɔlo mpo na kofungola ba thème mosusu.
profile.backupTitle: Ba Backup ya kobatelama & Synchronisation ya appareil
profile.backupDesc: Salá ba backup ya clés na mot de passe, pe zongisa na appareil mosusu mpo na kosínkronizá.
profile.privacyBlurEnabled: Bɔmbá nsango na e-monani ya liboso
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Bɔmbá soki appli ezali na nse
profile.notifyOnCopy: Yebisa ngai soki moto akopi nsango na ngai
profile.followHint: Ba ‘stories’ na bango ekomonana na ‘Oyo nalandi’ soki batieli ‘Followers’ (to ‘Public’).
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Eloko moko ekokaki malamu te na eténi oyo.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Tindisa ba bɛngi mpe ba SMS koya na téléphone to email oyo esilá koverifié. Soki otindí kobɛnga/SMS, ekoki komonana lokola numéro ya Chatforia.
profile.errE164: Kotisa numéro ya téléphone na E.164 (ndakisa +15551234567).
profile.errSmsDest: Pona esika moko ata moko (telefone to email).
profile.errQuietHours: Ngonga ya kimya esengeli kozala kati na 0 na 23.

chat.selectPrompt: Pona texte to salon mpo na kobanda kosolola
chat.emptySubtitle: Tinda nsango mpo na kobanda lisolo.

sidebar.loginPrompt: Kɔta mpo na kobongola ba paramètres.

premium.heading: Kóma Premium
premium.description: Fungola ba fonctionnalités makasi & longola ba pub.

auth.headline: Mesaje ya mokili mobimba na bobateli, na libongoli ya mbala moko
auth.description: E2E encryption, libongoli ya AI, nsango eyebungaka, mpe kobɛnga mongongo/video.

feature.privacy: Privacy liboso. Ba data na yo, kontrolɛ na yo.

auth.desktopTip: Na desktop? Kana na telefone mpo na kozwa appli.
auth.subhead: Mesaje privé, ecrypté, mpe ebongolamaka — na mbala moko.
auth.tip: Okoki kosalela Chatforia na appareil nioso — to telemisa appli mpo na experience ya makasi.
auth.scanHint: Scan mpo na kozwa appli to kofungola na navigateur.

footer.doNotSell: Kotɛkola te ba info na ngai

home.title: Ebandeli
home.subheader: Tinda nsango mpo na kobanda lisolo.
home.sendTooltipEmpty: Koma nsango liboso mpo na kotinda

press.title: Press
press.contact: Mpo na mituna ya média, tɔ́ndelá biso na press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia ezali messagerie ya bobateli na libongoli ya mbala moko mpe E2E encryption, mpo na kosalisa mikanda ya mokili mobimba kozala ya privé mpe pɛtɛ́.
press.assetsText: Logos, ba captures, mpe bilili ya produit (ekoya bientôt).

careers.title: Mosala
careers.intro: Tózali ekipi ya moke ezali kotonga messagerie ya mokili mobimba, privé. Soki olingi encryption, accessibility, mpe UX ya kitoko, tiká tóyoka yo.
careers.openRoles: Ba mosala oyo ezali: Engineering (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Produit, Support.

about.title: Oyo ezali Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia ezali messagerie ya lokóta mingi, na E2E encryption, libongoli ya mbala moko, mpe kobɛnga mongongo/video. Mokano na biso: kosalisa bato bakanisana — na bobateli, na kimia, mpe na kolobana na lokóta nionso.

values.access: Kokóma epai nionso: Libongoli automatique ya 100+ lokóta.
values.control: Kontrolɛ: Nsango eyebungaka & bilembo ya kotángami ezali ya kopona.

about.howDescription: Ba nsango ebombamaka (encrypté) na appareil liboso esila. Libongoli, ba backup, mpe sync ya appareil esalemi mpo na kokitisa oyo server ekoki komona.

advertise.title: Reklame na Chatforia
advertise.description: Kokoma epai ya base ya bayekoli ya messagerie na bisaleli ya kitoko mpe ya sécurité. Tozali na ba bannières ya esika ya monene, parrainages, mpe promos ya ndako. Ba Premium bamona te ba pub.

adsense.withPubId: Sik’oyo tozali kosalela Google AdSense. Soki olingi kotɛnamela biso na Google Ads, salá ID ya moteyi {{pubId}} mpe senga placement géré na ba unités oyo. Parrainage ya directe ezali — salá formulaire.
adsense.noPubId: Tozali kosalela Google AdSense. Parrainage ya directe pe ezali — salá formulaire nse.

advertise.noPlacements: Ba placement esalemá te naino. Bakisa yango na ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Session mingi mpe tango molayi na UI ya chat
why.brandSafe: Format ya sécurité; fréquence ya kopesa pub na bobateli
why.sponsoredMoments: Ba ‘moments’ ya parrainage (ndakisa “Start a Chat” modal) ezali
why.deals: Ba contrats directs to programmatique na AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Matondo! Mituna na yo etindamí. Tokolanda nokinoki.
form.mailtoInfo: Kofungola email client mpo na kotinda mituna…
form.messagePlaceholder: Targeting, mikolo, KPI, ba placement olingi…

upgrade.title: Upgrade
upgrade.subtitle: Pona plan oyo ebongi na yo: longola pub na Plus, to zwa ba fonctionnalités nyonso na Premium.

features.ringtones: Ba sonnerie & ba milómi ya sango ya moto

features.sameFeatures: Ba fonctionnalités kaka ndenge ya sanza

gettingStarted.title: Kobanda
gettingStarted.subtitle: Oza ya sika na Chatforia? Boye, malako oyo ya nse ekosalisa okoma na mosala na mikolo mike.

alert.text: Guide oyo ekozala monene tango tozali ko lancer ba fonctionnalités ya sika. Soki eloko ezangi, yebisa biso na

section1.title: 1) Salá compte na yo
section1.loginText: na compte oyo ozali na yango.

section2.title: 2) Banda kosolola
section2.item1: Salá DM to Groupe mpe tinda nsango ya liboso.
section2.item2: Salelá libongoli ya mbala moko mpo na kolobela 100+ lokóta.
section2.item3: Meka nsango eyebungaka mpe bilembo ya kotángami na Profili → Privacy.

section3.title: 3) Kende mosika
section3.item1Part2: (Plus = sans pub, Premium = ba fonctionnalités nyonso).
section3.item2Part1: Kangisa ba appareil mosusu mpe setapá ba backup na

account.q: Ndenge nini nasalaki to nazongisaki compte?
account.a: Zwa appli to salá web, tanga “Salá compte”, verifié email/telefone. Mpo na kozongisa, salá “Obosani mot de passe”.

privacy.a: Ɛɛ. Ba nsango mpe ba bɛngi ezali E2E na ebandeli. Yo mpe moto oyambi nde bokoki kotánga.

translate.q: Libongoli ya mbala moko esalaka ndenge nini?
translate.a: Yokisá “Auto-translate” na Paramètres → Emonaní & Lokóta. To bongolaka na appareil soki ekoki, to na ba API ya sécurité na makambo moke ya metadata.

contact.a: Tɔ́ndelá biso na support@chatforia.com. Bakisaka ba capture mpe version ya appli.

contact.title: Bengá Biso
contact.successMsg: Matondo — ekipi na biso ekoyanola na email.

intro.body: Politiki oyo elobeli ndenge Chatforia (“biso”) ezwaka, esalelaka, mpe esanganisaka makambo tango ozali kosalela ba appli na biso. Tosalela Chatforia mpo na kokitisa ba data oyo tokoki komona.

infoWeCollect.title: Makambo tozwaka
infoWeCollect.account: Makambo ya compte (ndakisa email/telefone) mpo na kosala mpe kobatela compte.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Makambo ecrypté (ba nsango/bɛngi) ezali E2E; biso tozali kotánga te.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Ba diagnostics/usage lokola ba rapport ya crash, lolenge ya appareil, to statistique moke mpo na kobongisa.

howWeUse.title: Ndenge tosalelelaka makambo
howWeUse.provide: Kopesa mpe kobatela service (auth, koyeba spam/abus).

sharing.title: Kokabola
sharing.body: Totɛki ba données te. Tokoki kokabola moke na ba processeurs (push, analytics) na boyangeli makasi.

rights.title: Makoki na yo
rights.body: Kolanda etuka na yo (ndakisa GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), okoki kosɛnga koyeba, kobongisa, kolongola, to koboya misala mosusu. Contact: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Bokómɔ & sécurité
retention.body: Tobombaka kaka oyo esengeli mpo na kosalela service mpe tosundolaka sécurité ya industrie. E2E contenu tokoki te koyibula.

children.title: Bana
children.body: Chatforia esalemi te mpo na bana na nse ya 13 (to ndenge mibeko na etuka na yo elobi).

changes.title: Mbongwana
changes.body: Tokotya sika awa mpe tokobongola ‘Last updated’.

intro.body: Na kosalela Chatforia, oyambi Conditions oyo. Soki oyambi te, salela te service.

accounts.title: Ba Comptes
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Pesá makambo ya solo mpe batela ba clés na sécurité.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Oozali na mokumba ya makambo esalemaka na compte na yo.

acceptableUse.title: Bosaleli malamu
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Te na biloko ya mabe, ya mibeko te, to oyo ebebisaka—te na spam to abus automatisé.

yourContent.title: Makambo na yo
yourContent.body: Okómaka na biteni na yo. Ope­si biso lotomo oyo esengeli mpo na kosala service (ndakisa kobimisa, kobomba, libongoli).

disclaimer.title: Ba avertissement & mokumba
disclaimer.body: Service epesamaka ‘etélemá kaka’ ata garanti te. Kino esengeli na mibeko, Chatforia azali na mokumba te mpo na kimobeko ya mpenza to mabe ya sima.

changes.title: Mbongwana
changes.body: Tokoki kobongola ba conditions; soki okoba kosalela sima ya mbongwana, elingi koloba oyambi.

doNotSell.title: Kotɛkola to Kokabola Makambo na Ngai te
doNotSell.body: Chatforia etɛkoli ba makambo ya bato te. Ata bongo, bato ya California bakoki kaka kotinda basɛngɔ oyo etali CPRA awa na nse.

cookies.title: Paramètre ya Cookies
cookies.body: Chatforia esalelaka cookies moke (session, sécurité). Tozalaka te na cookies ya pub ya bato ya misusu. Betela cookies na paramètres ya navigateur na yo.

phoneNumberManager.unableToLoadStatus: Ekoki te koyeba état ya numéro.
phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Numéro napesami te. Pona na par code ya ‘area’ mpo na kobanda SMS.

startChatModal.title: Banda lisolo
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Koma nkombo, username, téléphone to email…
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Téléfone/email ekomonana kaka soki obombeli yango lokola contact.
startChatModal.failedBulkStart: Libunga na kobanda lisolo na bato oponi.

sounds.freeNotice: Ozali na Free — ba tones ya premium emonisami kasi ekangami. Upgrade mpo na kofungola nioso.

aiSettings.title: Paramètres ya AI
aiSettings.controlIntro: Kontrolá libongoli, ba eyano ya smart, mpe ba auto-réponses ya ForiaBot.
aiSettings.autoTranslateIncoming: Bongola nsango oyo eya na se
aiSettings.showOriginalAlongside: Lakisa ya liboso elongo na libongoli
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Tinda ba nsango mike ya nsuka (éliminé biloko ya particuliers) na AI mpo na bopesi ya eyano ya nokinoki.
aiSettings.maskProfanity: Bómba maloba mabe na ba proposition ya AI
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Soki etelemá, maloba oyo éflagami ekobombama
aiSettings.enableAutoReply: Salisá eyano automatique tango nazali ocupé
aiSettings.saveFailed: Kobomba paramètres ya AI elongi te

accessibilitySettings.title: Accessibility & Alarmes
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Ba opsi mpo na kosalisa kosalela Chatforia ata soki milómi ezangi.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: Ebandaka na monene ya normal. Bɔtɔmbola soki olingi makomi minene.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc: Bannière mpe kobɛta titre mpo okosa te.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Vibre na nsango ya sika (soki ekoki)
Kobenda appareil na vibration tango mayɛlɛ.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Fulangisa écran na kobɛnga koya
Fulangisa mokuse tango kobɛnga ekowumela.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Kokoma mongongo na makomi na se
Bakakisa transcription na audio ozwi.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlerts: Mayɛlɛ na miso mpo na nsango & kobɛnga
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Lakisa bannière mpe titre ekɛlɛ mpo okosa te.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewShort: Vibre na nsango ya sika (soki ekoki)

privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Tobomba kaka ‘ciphertext’ na server. Ezongisi AI/Libongoli mpe kotalela moderasyo.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Luka na alias, nkombo, username, to telefone
peoplePage.inviteDesc: Bɔndisela lien ya invitation mpo na kobanda lisolo sik’oyo.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: Koma na boyangeli na nzela ya Chatforia ya iOS mpe Android.
peoplePage.syncTip: Tip: Ba nsango na yo etikalaka na sync kati na web mpe mobile.

randomChat.title: Random Chat
randomChat.description: Kutana na moto ya sika mbala moko. Tokokabola bino mpe tokofungola salon ya suka moke.
randomChat.saveGuard: Kaka lisolo na moto na moto nde ekoki kobombama
